Volunteering Volunteering at Fairchild Volunteers let a few hours of their time blossom into a world of new experiences while working in Fairchild’s beautiful environment. Fairchild volunteers have been an integral part of the Garden’s history and contribute to every aspect of our operations. Volunteers learn new skills, make a positive impact in the community and the world, and advance Fairchild’s mission through their hands-on support of our programs. Fairchild volunteers have access to a wide range of classes and training opportunities. All active Fairchild volunteers who give a minimum of 30 hours of service a year automatically become part of the Friends of Fairchild, which hosts lectures, field trips, and social activities. Volunteer Requirements Most adult volunteer opportunities require a commitment of 3-4 hours per week for a minimum of three months. These are typically done with one shift per week on the same day, although some areas are more flexible than others. For short term opportunities, we offer Special Events positions, and these do not require the same weekly/monthly commitment. These are open to students. Our minimum age is 14. All year-round Fairchild Volunteers are required to participate in Core Class Training as well as additional training for specific volunteer areas. Volunteer Information Sessions Volunteer Information Events are held throughout the year to inform Fairchild members and the public about available opportunities and requirements. Following the application and interview process, volunteers are selected for programs based on their experience, skills and availability. In certain program areas, a second placement interview is required. The types and numbers of openings vary considerably throughout the year. Upcoming Information Sessions: General Volunteer Recruitment: October 4th, 2025 @ 11am Please contact volunteer@fairchildgarden.org to RSVP! Group/Corporate Volunteer Days Group Volunteer Days are a way for volunteers to try their hand with horticulture and contribute to beautifying the Garden! This is the perfect project for a community group or a corporate team building project! Projects can vary and can include weeding, trimming, pruning, major plant removal, plant relocation, and more. These sessions are open to community groups or individuals. We set a limit of 20, if your group is larger, please contact us to discuss. Minimum age is 14, or 12 with a parent/guardian accompanying. Usually hosted from 9AM-12PM but can be flexible. Please contact volunteer@fairchildgarden.org to register. Where You Can Volunteer Adult Volunteers: Volunteer positions vary throughout the year! Currently recruiting for various positions in Administration, Education, Horticulture, Wings of the Tropics, Visitor Services, and Conservation. For more information, contact us! Student Program: Students are currently being accepted for weekend volunteering opportunities and Special Events volunteer opportunities. Please contact volunteer@fairchildgarden.org for more information! Fairchild’s Current Internship opportunities: Internships Contact Us 305-667-1651, ext. 3334 or volunteer@fairchildgarden.org ___________________ Volunteer Portal Active volunteers click here to access your portal. If you are currently in the process of becoming a volunteer, please wait for further instructions from the Volunteer Department.

Buy Tickets Bugging Out Bugging Out at Fairchild is bigger, bolder, and buggier than ever! Join us for giant robotic bug encounters with some of the most fascinating creatures in the insect world. Get Tickets Visit our Tropical Oasis Explore the wonders and beauty of tropical plants and nature at Fairchild. Buy Tickets Visit our Tropical Oasis Explore the wonders and beauty of tropical plants and nature at Fairchild. Buy Tickets "I just ordered 3 tickets for myself and neighbors! I went to Fairchild today and had a great time walking and taking beautiful photos!" "The waterfall with the lotus, it is a place of peace, and the place of the butterflies! Thank you by this beautiful place and thanks you to volunteers!" "I love to go to visit the gardens at Fairchild! It’s so restorative and peaceful. It sparks joy to be here. I love to meditate by the lovely floating flowers. " "I live nearby and go to Fairchild almost every Sunday, it’s such a peaceful place to be, breathe, and enjoy nature! I ordered a Native Orchid Starter Kit recently and can’t wait - it’s definitely new!! They have done a great job cleaning that greenhouse up, it looks brand new." "Fairchild Tropical Botanic Garden, thank you. We have been members and made donations in the past. We love this place and love to tell others about it. Thank you so much!" "We had a great, magical night at Fairchild Tropical Botanic Garden enhanced by the live music." "I love Fairchild! I’ve been there several times and it is always lovely." "One of the most beautiful places in the U.S.A." "I’m member so I come to Fairchild very often. There are always flowers in bloom and lots of butterflies." "I love Fairchild, it’s my happy place. I’ve been a member for years." "Get a membership and return many times for free! Fairchild is a great place to walk and relax!" "I visit Fairchild at least a couple of times a month. There’s always an event, flowers blooming, beautiful butterflies and so much space for walking." "We went for a walk around Fairchild last week and had lunch there for my grandma’s 97th birthday. It was so much fun!" "One of my favorite places ever!" "Just got home with plenty of beautiful flowers from Fairchild. I found everything I was looking for and more at good prices. What an awesome day!" "It’s beautiful! I was there today with my husband, and it was a spectacular experience learning about so many types of tropical trees and all over the planet. The flowers, butterflies and panoramic pics are gorgeous. Thank you!" "A true South Florida treasure!" "Simply beautiful…Looking to go here? GO!" "By far, one of the best private parks/gardens. Very open and friendly." "What I love most about Fairchild Tropical Botanical Gardens is the energy. Such a lovely place to go to be letting all the positive vibrations enter your mind and soul." "Fairchild has a 90 minute free tour by outstanding guides on a 12- seater trolleys. Excellent for those who can't walk far. Beautiful greenery. Many lizards, geckos, butterflies. Here and the beautiful leafy Coral Gables area is definitely worth a visit for tourists." "This place is magical! Any day, every time of the year we discover new marvels." "A very special place. After a visit to these beautiful grounds it feels like you’ve “been away.” You don’t have to be a horticulturalist or botanist to enjoy the beauty of the grounds." "What a beautiful, well-kept place to explore nature!" "This place is huge. So well maintained. Beautiful beyond words. I felt like i was walking around a fairytale garden and park. The best garden I've ever been too." "I absolutely LOVE THIS PLACE. Please be sure to take the tram ride. Our guide was wonderful and fun and i learned a lot about Florida being from NY. Please also check out the Butterfly Garden it was magical." "A beautiful gem tucked away from the hustle and bustle of Miami. A café is on site with tasty treats for the family and a small bar with some rotating choices for beer and mixed drinks." "It is an enchanted garden by any measure. Dozens of different palms, multiple types of bananas, great variety of orchids and begonias. It is wide open. Though there are many visitors one feels alone with only butterflies and singing birds for company. Be prepared to spend a whole day." Bugging Out Bugs are taking over Fairchild—BIG TIME! This summer, come face-to-face with giant robotic insects, from a 20-ft praying mantis to a mega bumblebee. It’s hands-on, action-packed, and full of cool bug facts you won’t want to miss! Twilight Safari Party & Movie Night Experience Fairchild Garden after dark with twilight tram rides, live music, and an outdoor movie under the stars. One night, endless ways to explore, relax, and enjoy." Trolls Quest: A Garden Adventure Step into the Garden this September and let the adventure begin! On October 4th, Boots & Blooms: A Country Night brings you live country rock from the Back Country Boys, moonshine tastings, and non-stop fall fun you’ll be talking about all season! Field Trips at Fairchild Take a live or virtual adventure through the Garden that will immerse students in unique ecosystems. Classes with Our Experts Join us for art, horticulture, culinary, and more! The Fairchild App Download our app for a fully interactive Garden experience. Family Fun At Fairchild, there is always something for the whole family to enjoy. Adventure awaits around every corner! Shop Fairchild Plants Transform your home garden into your very own tropical paradise! Garden Weddings Say “I DO” in your very own Tropical Oasis. Your dream wedding at the Garden awaits. Volunteer Join the Fairchild Family! Learn more about how you can become a Fairchild Volunteer! Rare Plant Auction Interested in rare plants? Purchase your next plant from our eBay Nursery Plant Collection. Dog Dates Join us at the Garden for some fresh air and fun with your pup. Join the Fairchild Family Make a difference and become a member at the Garden today! Birthdays at Fairchild Children’s birthdays are such a special occasion and what better place to celebrate than at the Garden. Science & Education Discover the beauty and value of nature at the Garden. The Fairchild Challenge Register your school today for our award-winning environmental science competition! Million Orchid Project Join the native orchid reintroduction program for South Florida. Purchase a Restoration Kit today! Bird Walks Enjoy an early morning bird walk in a tropical oasis. Fairchild on Lincoln We have reimagined the landscape of Lincoln Road as a botanic garden! Stay Connected Hours & Admission Fairchild is open every day except for Christmas, December 25 Hours 10:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. Admission Fairchild Members Free Adults $24.95 Child (6-17) $11.95 Students (with valid ID) $15.95 Seniors (65 and over) $17.95 In-Garden tram rides Free Parking Free Location 10901 Old Cutler Rd, Miami, FL 33156 Members Get Tickets Non-Members Buy Tickets 25 Minutes Miami International Airport 32 Minutes Miami Beach 9 Minutes University of Miami Glasshouse Café Menu FOLLOW THE LATEST @fairchildgarden div class="ig-feed__inner">

Private Event Venue Miami
Make Fairchild Your Miami Event Space
Whether it’s an intimate gathering of 10 or a large-scale event with hundreds of guests, Fairchild’s event spaces are the perfect place to hold your next event in South Florida. You can host an elegant black-tie affair, a more casual jazz brunch or bridal luncheon, a birthday party, a festive rehearsal dinner, or a strategic planning meeting. You can organize a thoughtful lecture series or musical performance or exquisite cocktails at sunset.
Fairchild offers unique venue options for large scale events or a more intimate special event, as well as indoor and outdoor spaces suited to private parties, social events, corporate parties, business meetings, and more. Let us host your next event at one of our unique event venues near downtown Miami!

At Fairchild, we are committed to providing you and your guests with the experience of a lifetime in our upscale event venues. As a facilities rental venue, our focus is to provide you with a breathtakingly beautiful event space while allowing you to choose the caterer, party planners, and vendors to make it your own.
Our event specialists help you map out your special day by facilitating event venue site visits or walk-throughs and overseeing deliveries and vendor setup on the event day. We also supervise the transition during the event to ensure the elements flow seamlessly from one to another.
Our Unique Event Venues
'Entrance' in the Palmetum
‘Entrance’ in the Palmetum
Aptly named ‘Entrance’, this beautiful sculpture by artist Ilan Averbuch sits on the Palmetum’s longest vista and is the perfect backdrop for your event or celebration.
Inquire About the ‘Entrance’ in the Palmetum
Capacity
40 guests.
Daytime Rates
Base rental rate for 1-40 guests is $2,000– $3,400 for an event up to four hours; each additional guest is $30pp. Additional ancillary fees are approximately $450.
Evening Rates
Base rental rate for 1-40 guests is $3,400 – $7,000 for an event up to four hours; each additional guest is $30pp. Additional ancillary fees are approximately $1,250; ancillary fees for our event venues to include such items as catering permit, security/Coral Gables police officer, facilities staff fee, Certificate of Insurance.
Ellipse Mosaic Patio
Ellipse Mosaic Patio
Your guests will gather in the Ellipse Mosaic Patio while flanked by a glorious staircase of coral rocks. Make your private event iconic in this elegant patio space.
Inquire About the Ellipse Mosaic Patio
Capacity
40 guests.
Daytime Rates
Base rental rate for 1-40 guests is $2,600 – $3,000 for an event up to four hours; each additional guest is $30pp. Additional ancillary fees are approximately $450.
Evening Rates
Base rental rate for 1-40 guests is $3,400 – $7,000 for an event up to four hours; each additional guest is $30pp. Additional ancillary fees are approximately $1,250; ancillary fees for our event venues to include such items as catering permit, security/Coral Gables police officer, facilities staff fee, Certificate of Insurance.
Phillips Courtyard
Phillips Courtyard
Named after the Garden’s landscape architect, Phillips Courtyard is a charming area featuring beautiful coral rock and surrounded by lush foliage and moss-laden oak trees that frame our Gatehouse, a stunning and classic Florida stone house. This event space was the original 1938 entrance to the Fairchild property and anchors the stately Allée & Overlook.
Inquire About the Phillips Courtyard
Capacity
40 guests.
Daytime Rates
Base rental rate for 1-40 guests is $2,800 – $3,200 for an event up to four hours. Additional ancillary fees are approximately $450.
Evening Rates
Base rental rate for 1-40 guests is $3,200 – $6,700 for an event up to four hours; each additional guest is $30pp. Additional ancillary fees are approximately $1,250; ancillary fees for our event venues to include such items as catering permit, security/Coral Gables police officer, facilities staff fee, Certificate of Insurance.
Patio & Sand Garden Area
Patio & Sand Garden Area
Featuring lush tropical foliage nearby our iconic rainforest, the Patio and Sand Garden Area is a captivating hideaway the perfect event space for your intimate gathering.
Inquire About the Patio & Sand Garden Area
Capacity
50 guests.
Daytime Rates
Base rental rate for 1-40 guests is $2,000 – $3,400 for an event up to four hours; each additional guest is $30pp. Additional ancillary fees are approximately $450.
Evening Rates
Base rental rate for 1-40 guests is $4,000 – $7,000 for an event up to four hours; each additional guest is $30pp. Additional ancillary fees are approximately $1,250; ancillary fees for our event venues to include such items as catering permit, security/Coral Gables police officer, facilities staff fee, Certificate of Insurance.
Tropical Arboretum
Tropical Arboretum
An event in the Tropical Arboretum, the only such place in Miami, ensures a lush, intimate setting where your guests will be surrounded by over 700 species of flowering trees from around the world here in South Florida.
Inquire About the Tropical Arboretum
Capacity
60 guests.
Daytime Rates
Base rental rate for 1-40 guests is $2,000 – $3,400 for an event up to four hours; each additional guest is $30pp. Additional ancillary fees are approximately $450.
Evening Rates
Base rental rate for 1-40 guests is $3,400 – $7,000 for an event up to four hours; each additional guest is $30pp. Additional ancillary fees are approximately $1,250; ancillary fees for our event venues to include such items as catering permit, security/Coral Gables police officer, facilities staff fee, Certificate of Insurance.
Glasshouse Café & Patio
Glasshouse Café & Patio
The beautiful
Glasshouse Café
features beautiful floor to ceiling windows that overlook the exotic butterfly exhibit “Wings of the Tropics,” offering a breathtaking panoramic view of butterflies and hummingbirds in flight. Look up and you’ll see a stunning Dale Chihuly glass chandelier. French doors connect you to the lush foliage outdoors, charming bistro, and nearby Rainforest.
Inquire About the Glasshouse Café & Patio
Capacity
Up to 50 guests with dedicated seating during daytime (partial rental); up to 100 guests with dedicated seating during evenings (full rental).
Daytime Rates
Available for partial rental only. Base rental rate for 1-50 people is $2750 – $3250 for an event up to five hours; Additional ancillary fees are approximately $450.
Evening Rates
Base rental rate for 1-100 guests is $7,000 – $10,000 for an event up to five hours; each additional guest is $30pp. Additional ancillary fees are approximately $1,200; ancillary fees for our event venues to include such items as catering permit, security/Coral Gables police officer, facilities staff fee, Certificate of Insurance.
Allée & Overlook Vista
Allée & Overlook Vista
The journey down the tree-lined Allée, which culminates at the Overlook Vista — a magnificent keyhole setting that overlooks the entire Garden — is an experience unlike any other. This event venue is functional and awe-inspiring.
Inquire About the Allée & Overlook Vista
Capacity
80 guests.
Daytime Rates
Base rental rate for 1-100 guests is $2,750 – $3,250 for an event up to five hours; each additional guest is $30pp. Additional ancillary fees are approximately $450.
Evening Rates
Base rental rate for 1-100 guests is $3,250 – $6,000 for an event up to five hours; each additional guest is $30pp. Additional ancillary fees are approximately $1,250; ancillary fees for our event venues to include such items as catering permit, security/Coral Gables police officer, facilities staff fee, Certificate of Insurance.

Amazonica Pool & Lawn
Amazonica Pool & Lawn

Garden Club of America Amphitheater
Garden Club of America Amphitheater
Of all our event venues within our gardens, the Garden Club of America Amphitheater is perhaps the most formal. This timeless, iconic, fully outdoor space is shaded by coconut palm trees and framed by oolitic Florida limestone. This quiet, refined setting is a space unique among all other Miami (and indeed, Florida) venues!
Inquire About the Amphitheater
Capacity
250 guests.
Daytime Rates
Base rental rate for up to 75 guests is $2,900 – $3,400; each additional guest is $30pp. Fees are based on an event up to four hours. Additional ancillary fees apply; approximately $450. No rain plan site; renter to provide a tent.
Evening Rates
Base rental rate for up to 75 guests is $3,400 – $7,000 for an event up to five hours; each additional guest is $30pp. Additional ancillary fees are approximately $1,200; ancillary fees for our event venues to include such items as catering permit, security/Coral Gables police officer, facilities staff fee, Certificate of Insurance.

Memorials
Memorial Locations
Allee & Overlook
The journey down the tree-lined Allee ends at the Overlook, a magnificent key-hole vista overlooking Pandanus Lake. The Overlook offers a wide, panoramic view of the Garden’s lowlands areas and lakes, providing a striking counterpart to the narrow view of the Allee.
Amphitheater
Following an elegant entrance across a land bridge, guests enter an enchanting coconut tree grove. Featuring a gorgeous limestone dais, the historic Amphitheater is an intimate event space, perfect for a memorial or celebration of life.

Make Fairchild Your Miami Event Space
Whether it’s an intimate gathering of 10 or a large-scale event with hundreds of guests, Fairchild’s event spaces are the perfect place to hold your next event in South Florida. You can host an elegant black-tie affair, a more casual jazz brunch or bridal luncheon, a birthday party, a festive rehearsal dinner, or a strategic planning meeting. You can organize a thoughtful lecture series or musical performance or exquisite cocktails at sunset.
Fairchild offers unique venue options for large scale events or a more intimate special event, as well as indoor and outdoor spaces suited to private parties, social events, corporate parties, business meetings, and more. Let us host your next event at one of our unique event venues near downtown Miami!

At Fairchild, we are committed to providing you and your guests with the experience of a lifetime in our upscale event venues. As a facilities rental venue, our focus is to provide you with a breathtakingly beautiful event space while allowing you to choose the caterer, party planners, and vendors to make it your own.
Our event specialists help you map out your special day by facilitating event venue site visits or walk-throughs and overseeing deliveries and vendor setup on the event day. We also supervise the transition during the event to ensure the elements flow seamlessly from one to another.

Memorials
When considering a special gathering place to remember a loved one, Fairchild offers one large gathering space as well as infinite possibilities for outdoor event spaces, allowing guests to take full advantage of natural beauty of the Garden.
In addition to hosting your memorial or celebration of life at Fairchild, you can also
purchase a memorial brick, bench or dedicated tree
in honor of your loved one.
Memorials
Memorial Locations
Allee & Overlook
The journey down the tree-lined Allee ends at the Overlook, a magnificent key-hole vista overlooking Pandanus Lake. The Overlook offers a wide, panoramic view of the Garden’s lowlands areas and lakes, providing a striking counterpart to the narrow view of the Allee.
Amphitheater
Following an elegant entrance across a land bridge, guests enter an enchanting coconut tree grove. Featuring a gorgeous limestone dais, the historic Amphitheater is an intimate event space, perfect for a memorial or celebration of life.
Rental Rules & Guidelines
Additional info about our Miami event venues:
Dates are subject to availability
Blackout dates do occur
Rates are subject to change without notice
Holidays are priced at evening/weekend rates
Fairchild has the right to decline or cancel events at their discretion
Membership discounts do not apply
Date/Venue fee not guaranteed until payment and signed agreement are received
Advanced reservations required
No outside alcoholic beverages allowed
No music or amplified sound without prior approval
Fairchild Tropical Botanic Garden provides venue space only; tables, chairs, and tents are available at an additional cost and based on availability

Membership As a valued Fairchild Member, you are joining a community that makes an indelible difference not just in South Florida but throughout the world. Your membership directly supports the beauty and science at Fairchild, science education and the best cultural programs, and events. Fairchild Members make what we do at the Garden possible. You’re joining one of the world’s preeminent botanical gardens, the home of the only K-12 botany magnet programs anywhere in the world and the largest student and citizen science outreach programs anywhere. Membership Benefits FREE daytime admission for ONE YEAR to 83 acres of gardens and exhibits. Access to our FREE selection of interactive tours, including guided tram tours and walking tours, and interactive programming. Discounts on tickets to premium daytime and evening events, concerts, lectures, our dynamic balance of classes, seminars, online plant sales, and more. Access to members-only previews for events and exhibitions (when available). Early morning Garden access on Tuesdays at 7:00 a.m. (at the South Entrance) Reciprocal benefits at participating gardens and arboreta. (Exclusions apply. Check visiting institution for restrictions/exclusions.) 100% tax deductible. (Certain restrictions apply for Sustaining and Signature levels) Membership Categories Customize your membership by choosing the category for your lifestyle. Each membership includes the benefits listed above. Click here to view our Membership Categories or scroll down to see each level. To join or renew or for more information, please contact Mary Neustein at 305-667-1651. ext. 3378 or email mneustein@fairchildgarden.org Join or Renew as a Fairchild Fellow Now Convert Your Admission to Membership Enjoy Fairchild every day by applying the price of your admission toward an annual membership to Fairchild on the day of your visit. Any of our friendly admission personnel can assist you during your visit or call the membership office at 305-667-1651, extension 3373 for more information. Offer expires 30 days after your visit. Give a Gift of Membership Share the wonders and beauty that Fairchild offers with a gift membership for a family, friend, or colleague. Choose from the many options and categories available. Opening the doors to our botanic garden offers gives a South Florida treasure as well as the opportunity to explore, explain and conserve the world of tropical plants. Gift a membership Senior Discount Individuals 65 and older are eligible to receive $10 off Individual, Dual, Family, and Family & Friends memberships. Certain restrictions apply. Cannot be combined with other discounts. Grandparents membership is ineligible for an additional senior discount. Discount is applied per membership, not per member. Student Discount Full-time college students between the ages of 18-24 are eligible to receive 50% off an Individual Membership. A valid student ID must be presented. Available for purchase in person only at The Shop. (Only available for Individual Memberships.) Teachers and Active Military Personnel Discount Active military personnel and full-time K-12 school teachers in Miami-Dade, Broward and Monroe counties may receive a 50% discount on Individual, Dual, Family and Family & Friends membership levels. A valid ID is required. Available for purchase in person only at The Shop. Membership FAQs Learn how to access your Fairchild membership account, how to contact the Member Services office, how you can save with a two-year membership, how to request a silent auction donation and important information regarding the tax deductibility of your membership. Contact Us For more information on membership at Fairchild, please contact Member Services at 305-667-1651, extension 3373. Please email any changes to your contact information to memberservices@fairchildgarden.org .
